name: Dragonfield
description:
Dragonfield

Fight in epic medieval fantasy sandbox battles! Inspired by the "good old days" of gaming where you could just sit down and play a few rounds against bots!

Use swords, shields, bows, magic and even ballistas and more. Upcoming free updates will bring armored horses, catapults and - of course - flyable dragons.

Watch armies of bots battle it out with ragdoll physics!

I've been working on Dragonfield alone for over 3 years now, doing everything myself - and I am looking forward to hear what you think!

This first alpha version includes 1 map and a couple of weapons and gadgets to play around with! It is recommended to keep the bot count around 40 for performance reasons, larger counts will be optimized very soon!

You can check the controls in the pause menu!

Planned updates include: Rideable horses, flyable dragons, large sieges with ladders, catapults and desctructible environments, a huge variety of weapons to choose from, army customization, full mod support! And a LOT more!

Dragonfield has a discord server - join it to suggest your ideas and leave your thoughts on the game, everyone is welcome! https://discord.gg/5p5EN27cHs
